title: Backend Developer (Python & Django)
description: Backend Developer | API Specialist | Passionate about Learning and Challenges
about:
A young and energetic backend programmer, focusing on Python, Django, and Flask, with key skills including REST API, OpenCV, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, Docker, HTML/CSS, Git, and Linux. Experienced in Fullstack projects such as an online store, with a passion for continuous learning and collaborating in professional teams to create innovative solutions in technology.

Ready to leverage military service opportunities in the form of amrieh to continue professional activities in software development.
description_seo: Seyyed Hossein Mousavi, Python/Django backend programmer with experience in REST API, Docker, and OpenCV.

projects.title: Online Store
projects.description:
Design and development of an online store using Django and Django REST Framework for managing users, products, and orders.
The database is developed with SQLite3, and the front-end is implemented using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
The project is still under development.

seo.title: Sayed Hossein Mousavi | Python and Django Programmer
seo.keywords: Python programmer, Django, Flask, military service amrieh, backend developer, programming resume, Python Developer, IT amrieh, Isfahan
